Spell.Name: Scatter Shot
Spell.Text: Active ability. Decreases the damage dealt by this tower by 50%, but doubles its attack speed.
Spell.Script: MOD SELF TOWER_DAMAGE_BONUS -50 PERCENT; MOD SELF TOWER_BAT_BONUS -50 PERCENT;

Spell.Name: Snipe
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Snipe ability, which increases the projectile speeds of this tower. In addition, projectiles from this tower will no longer follow their targets. Instead, they gain a chance to pass through a creep on collision, dealing damage multiple times to a single target or multiple targets in a line. Replaces Scatter Shot. Active ability.

&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - +100% move speed, 25% chance
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - +250% move speed, 50% chance 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - +500% move speed, 75% chance 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +1000% move speed, 100% chance

Spell.Name: Snipe
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Projectiles from this tower travel 100% faster but lose the ability to follow targets. However, they also pass through enemy creeps 25% of the time.

Spell.Name: Snipe
Spell.Text: Active ability. Projectiles from this tower travel 100% faster but lose the ability to follow targets. However, they also pass through enemy creeps 25% of the time.

Spell.Name: Snipe
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Projectiles from this tower travel 250% faster but lose the ability to follow targets. However, they also pass through enemy creeps 50% of the time.

Spell.Name: Snipe
Spell.Text: Active ability. Projectiles from this tower travel 250% faster but lose the ability to follow targets. However, they also pass through enemy creeps 50% of the time.

Spell.Name: Snipe
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Projectiles from this tower travel 500% faster but lose the ability to follow targets. However, they also pass through enemy creeps 75% of the time.

Spell.Name: Snipe
Spell.Text: Active ability. Projectiles from this tower travel 500% faster but lose the ability to follow targets. However, they also pass through enemy creeps 75% of the time.

Spell.Name: Snipe
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Projectiles from this tower travel 1000% faster but lose the ability to follow targets. However, they also pass through enemy creeps.

Spell.Name: Snipe
Spell.Text: Active ability. Projectiles from this tower travel 100% faster but lose the ability to follow targets. However, they also pass through enemy creeps.

Spell.Name: Point Blank
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Point Blank ability, which doubles this tower's damage if it attacks a nearby creep. Passive ability.

&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - 64px radius
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 96px radius
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 128px radius

Spell.Name: Point Blank
Spell.Text: Passive ability. This tower deals double damage if its initial attack target is within 64px of this tower.

Spell.Name: Point Blank
Spell.Text: Passive ability. This tower deals double damage if its initial attack target is within 96px of this tower.

Spell.Name: Point Blank
Spell.Text: Passive ability. This tower deals double damage if its initial attack target is within 128px of this tower.

Spell.Name: Teleport
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Teleport ability, which allows it to instantly move to another unoccupied location. Triggered ability.

&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 5 min. cooldown
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 3 min. cooldown

Spell.Name: Teleport
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Instantly teleports this tower to another unoccupied location. 5 minute cooldown.

Spell.Name: Teleport
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Instantly teleports this tower to another unoccupied location. 3 minute cooldown.

Spell.Name: Singularity
Spell.Text: Grants this tower the Singularity ability, which instantly teleports all creeps on the page to a targeted empty location. Cannot be used to teleport creeps into unreachable areas. Triggered ability.\n\n&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 1 charge

Spell.Name: Singularity
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Teleports all creeps on the page to a targeted, unoccupied location. Cannot be used to teleport creeps into unreachable areas.

Spell.Name: Chain Shot
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Chain Shot ability, which allows this tower to fire multiple projetiles every time it would normally attack. However, each projectile deals less damage than it normally would. Replaces Scatter Shot. Active ability.

&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - 2 projectiles, 50% damage
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - 3 projectiles, 50% damage
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 4 projectiles, 50% damage
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 5 projectiles, 50% damage

Spell.Name: Chain Shot
Spell.Text: Active ability. Each time this tower attacks, it fires two projectiles instead of one. However, each projectile only does 50% of the tower's normal damage.

Spell.Name: Chain Shot
Spell.Text: Active ability. Each time this tower attacks, it fires three projectiles instead of one. However, each projectile only does 50% of the tower's normal damage.

Spell.Name: Chain Shot
Spell.Text: Active ability. Each time this tower attacks, it fires four projectiles instead of one. However, each projectile only does 50% of the tower's normal damage.

Spell.Name: Chain Shot
Spell.Text: Active ability. Each time this tower attacks, it fires five projectiles instead of one. However, each projectile only does 50% of the tower's normal damage.

Spell.Name: Reload
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Reload ability, which allows this tower to fire twice every few seconds. Passive ability.

&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - 5 sec. cooldown
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 4 sec. cooldown
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 3 sec. cooldown

Spell.Name: Reload
Spell.Text: Passive ability. When this spell is not on cooldown, this tower can fire twice in a row. 5 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Reload
Spell.Text: Passive ability. When this spell is not on cooldown, this tower can fire twice in a row. 4 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Reload
Spell.Text: Passive ability. When this spell is not on cooldown, this tower can fire twice in a row. 3 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Rotary Cannon
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Rotary Cannon ability, which reduces this tower's attack speed to one-tenth of its current attack speed for a certain amount of time. Triggered ability.

&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 5 sec., 1 charge
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 8 sec., 1 charge

Spell.Name: Rotary Cannon Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Reduces this tower's attack speed to one-tenth of its current attack speed for five seconds.

Spell.Name: Rotary Cannon
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Reduces this tower's attack speed to one-tenth of its current attack speed for five seconds.

Spell.Name: Rotary Cannon Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Reduces this tower's attack speed to one-tenth of its current attack speed for eight seconds.

Spell.Name: Rotary Cannon
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Reduces this tower's attack speed to one-tenth of its current attack speed for eight seconds.

Spell.Name: Piercing Shell
Spell.Text: Grants this tower the Piercing Shell ability, which causes every projectile from this tower to reduce an enemy creep's armor for a certain amount of time. Passive ability.\n\n&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - -1 armor, 3 sec. duration

Spell.Name: Piercing Shell Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Every projectile from this tower reduces the armor of enemy creeps that it hits by 1 for 3 seconds.

Spell.Name: Piercing Shell
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Every projectile from this tower reduces the armor of enemy creeps that it hits by 1 for 3 seconds, up to a maximum of -100 armor total.

Spell.Name: Piercing Shell
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Every projectile from this tower reduces the armor of enemy creeps that it hits by 1 for 3 seconds, up to a maximum of -100 armor total.

Spell.Name: Fluidity
Spell.Text: Active ability. Every time this tower fires, it gets a random bonus to damage between -25% and 50%, non-cumulative.

Spell.Name: Inkpool
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Inkpool ability, which creates a large blot of ink when this tower's projectiles hit an enemy creep. This blot of ink deals damage to enemy creeps that walk over it, decreasing over time, and lasts for 2 seconds. Replaces Fluidity. Active ability.

&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - 200 + 2x tower damage/sec.
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - 300 + 3x tower damage/sec. 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 400 + 4x tower damage/sec. 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 500 + 5x tower damage/sec.

Spell.Name: Inkpool Projectile Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. When projectiles from this tower hit an enemy creep, they explode and leave a large blot of ink on the page. This blot of ink deals a maximum of 200 + 2x this tower's damage every second, for 2 seconds.

Spell.Name: Inkpool
Spell.Text: Active ability. When projectiles from this tower hit an enemy creep, they explode and leave a large blot of ink on the page. This blot of ink deals a maximum of 200 + 2x this tower's damage every second, for 2 seconds. damage/sec.

Spell.Name: Inkpool Projectile Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. When projectiles from this tower hit an enemy creep, they explode and leave a large blot of ink on the page. This blot of ink deals a maximum of 300 + 3x this tower's damage every second, for 2 seconds.

Spell.Name: Inkpool
Spell.Text: Active ability. When projectiles from this tower hit an enemy creep, they explode and leave a large blot of ink on the page. This blot of ink deals a maximum of 300 + 3x this tower's damage every second, for 2 seconds.

Spell.Name: Inkpool Projectile Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. When projectiles from this tower hit an enemy creep, they explode and leave a large blot of ink on the page. This blot of ink deals a maximum of 400 + 4x this tower's damage every second, for 2 seconds.

Spell.Name: Inkpool
Spell.Text: Active ability. When projectiles from this tower hit an enemy creep, they explode and leave a large blot of ink on the page. This blot of ink deals a maximum of 400 + 4x this tower's damage every second, for 2 seconds.

Spell.Name: Inkpool Projectile Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. When projectiles from this tower hit an enemy creep, they explode and leave a large blot of ink on the page. This blot of ink deals a maximum of 500 + 5x this tower's damage every second, for 2 seconds.

Spell.Name: Inkpool
Spell.Text: Active ability. When projectiles from this tower hit an enemy creep, they explode and leave a large blot of ink on the page. This blot of ink deals a maximum of 500 + 5x this tower's damage every second, for 2 seconds.

Spell.Name: Drench
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Drench ability, which deals instant damage and reduces the targeted creep's armor for 10 seconds. 3 sec. cooldown. Triggered ability.
 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - 82 + normal damage, -2 armor 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 157 + normal damage, -3 armor 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 319 + normal damage, -5 armor

Spell.Name: Drench Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Reduces a targeted creep's armor by 2. Lasts for 10 seconds.

Spell.Name: Drench
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Instantly deals 82 + normal damage to a creep and reduces its armor by 2 for 10 seconds. 3 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Drench Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Reduces a targeted creep's armor by 3. Lasts for 10 seconds.

Spell.Name: Drench
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Instantly deals 157 + normal damage to a creep and reduces its armor by 3 for 10 seconds. 3 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Drench Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Reduces a targeted creep's armor by 5. Lasts for 10 seconds.

Spell.Name: Drench
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Instantly deals 319 + normal damage to a creep and reduces its armor by 5 for 10 seconds. 3 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Splash Aura
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Splash Aura ability, which increases the splash radius of all towers within 128px. Does not stack with Splash Aura. Passive ability.
 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 50% increase
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 100% increase

Spell.Name: Splash Aura Projectile Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Increases the splash radius of all towers within 128px by 50%. Does not affect the inherent splash radius of projectiles.

Spell.Name: Splash Aura Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Increases the splash radius of all towers within 128px by 50%. Does not affect the inherent splash radius of projectiles.

Spell.Name: Splash Aura
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Increases the splash radius of all towers within 128px by 50%. Does not affect the inherent splash radius of projectiles.

Spell.Name: Splash Aura Projectile Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Increases the splash radius of all towers within 128px by 100%. Does not affect the inherent splash radius of projectiles.
Spell.Script: REMOVE_SPELL 56 SELF SELF; MOD SELF PROJ_SPLASH_BONUS 100 PERCENT;

Spell.Name: Splash Aura Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Increases the splash radius of all towers within 128px by 100%. Does not affect the inherent splash radius of projectiles.

Spell.Name: Splash Aura
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Increases the splash radius of all towers within 128px by 100%. Does not affect the inherent splash radius of projectiles.

Spell.Name: The Great Flood
Spell.Text: Grants this tower The Great Flood ability, which instantly deals damage to all creeps based on the number of creeps on the page. 5 min. cooldown. Triggered ability. \n\n&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 1% max. HP damage per creep

Spell.Name: The Great Flood
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Inflicts 1% max. HP damage to all creeps for every creep that is currently on the page. 5 minute cooldown.

Spell.Name: Steam Cannon
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Steam Cannon ability, which allows this tower to fire a projectile every 0.01 seconds at the cost of reduced projectile damage. Active ability. 

&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - 1% normal damage
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - 2% normal damage
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 3% normal damage
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 4% normal damage

Spell.Name: Steam Cannon
Spell.Text: Active ability. This tower's attack speed is reduced to 0.01 seconds, but damage dealt by each projectile is also reduced to 1% normal damage.

Spell.Name: Steam Cannon
Spell.Text: Active ability. This tower's attack speed is reduced to 0.01 seconds, but damage dealt by each projectile is also reduced to 2% normal damage.

Spell.Name: Steam Cannon
Spell.Text: Active ability. This tower's attack speed is reduced to 0.01 seconds, but damage dealt by each projectile is also reduced to 3% normal damage.

Spell.Name: Steam Cannon
Spell.Text: Active ability. This tower's attack speed is reduced to 0.01 seconds, but damage dealt by each projectile is also reduced to 4% normal damage.

Spell.Name: Pressure Valve
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Pressure Valve ability, which extends the range of this tower. These bonuses are not cumulative. Passive ability.

&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - +50px
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - +75px 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +100px

Spell.Name: Pressure Valve
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Extends this tower's range by 50px.

Spell.Name: Pressure Valve
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Extends this tower's range by 75px.

Spell.Name: Pressure Valve
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Extends this tower's range by 100px.

Spell.Name: Scald
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Scald ability, which increases the projectile damage of this tower by a random amount every time this tower fires. Passive ability.
 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - +1-5 damage
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +1-15 damage

Spell.Name: Scald
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Each projectile from this tower deals an additional 1 to 5 damage.

Spell.Name: Scald
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Each projectile from this tower deals an additional 1 to 15 damage.

Spell.Name: Overheat
Spell.Text: Grants this tower the Overheat ability, which deals damage over time to nearby creeps within 64px from this tower. While Overheat is active, this tower cannot fire. Lasts for 30 sec. 5 min. cooldown. Triggered ability.\n\n&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 500 damage/sec.

Spell.Name: Overheat
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. While active, this tower will deal 500 damage/sec. to all creeps within 64px, but cannot fire. Lasts for 30 seconds. 5 minute cooldown.
Spell.Script: ADD_GOBJECT 5 (POINT2D ((GET POS_X SELF) + 16) ((GET POS_Y SELF) + 16)); APPLY_SPELL 78 SELF SELF;

Spell.Name: Overheat Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. While active, this tower will deal 500 damage/sec. to all creeps within 64px, but cannot fire. Lasts for 30 seconds. 5 minute cooldown.

Spell.Name: Shockwave
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Inflicts 100 damage to all creeps on the page and slows their movement speeds by 50% for 1 second. Does not stack with Shockwave. 1 minute cooldown.

Spell.Name: Shockwave
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Slows all creeps on the page by 50% for 1 second. Does not stack with Shockwave.

Spell.Name: Timerift
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Timerift ability, which stuns nearby creeps that are hit by this tower for a short amount of time. Does not stack with Timerift. Replaces Shockwave. Active ability.

&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - 0.1 sec. stun 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - 0.15 sec. stun
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 0.2 sec. stun
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 0.25 sec. stun

Spell.Name: Timerift Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Nearby creeps that are hit by this tower are stunned for 0.1 seconds.

Spell.Name: Timerift
Spell.Text: Active ability. Nearby creeps that are hit by this tower are stunned for 0.1 seconds.

Spell.Name: Timerift
Spell.Text: Active ability. Nearby creeps that are hit by this tower are stunned for 0.1 seconds.

Spell.Text: Passive ability. Nearby creeps that are hit by this tower are stunned for 0.15 seconds.

Spell.Text: Active ability. Nearby creeps that are hit by this tower are stunned for 0.15 seconds.

Spell.Text: Active ability. Nearby creeps that are hit by this tower are stunned for 0.15 seconds.

Spell.Text: Passive ability. Nearby creeps that are hit by this tower are stunned for 0.2 seconds.

Spell.Text: Active ability. Nearby creeps that are hit by this tower are stunned for 0.2 seconds.

Spell.Text: Active ability. Nearby creeps that are hit by this tower are stunned for 0.25 seconds.

Spell.Name: Stasis
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Stasis ability, which stuns a single creep for an amount of time. Triggered ability.

&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - 1 sec. stun, 30 sec. cooldown
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 2 sec. stun, 35 sec. cooldown 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 3 sec. stun, 40 sec. cooldown

Spell.Name: Stasis Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Stuns a targeted creep for 1 second.

Spell.Name: Stasis
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Stuns a targeted creep for 1 second. 30 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Stasis Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Stuns a targeted creep for 2 seconds.

Spell.Name: Stasis
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Stuns a targeted creep for 2 seconds. 35 second cooldown.

Spell.Text: Passive ability. Stuns a targeted creep for 3 seconds.

Spell.Name: Stasis
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Stuns a targeted creep for 3 seconds. 40 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Temporal Distortion
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Temporal Distortion ability, which slows the movement speed of all creeps and projectiles, as well as the attack speed of all towers, within 192px. Lasts for 30 seconds. Triggered ability.

&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 50% reduced speed, 1 charge
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 75% reduced speed, 1 charge

Spell.Name: Temporal Distortion Tower Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Slows this tower's attack speed by 50% for 30 seconds.

Spell.Name: Temporal Distortion Projectile Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Slows this projectile's movement speed by 50% for 30 seconds.

Spell.Name: Temporal Distortion Creep Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Slows this creep's movement speed by 50% for 30 seconds.

Spell.Name: Temporal Distortion
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Slows the movement speed of all creeps and projectiles, as well as the attack speed of all towers, within 192px by 50%. Lasts for 30 seconds.

Spell.Name: Temporal Distortion Tower Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Slows this tower's attack speed by 75% for 30 seconds.

Spell.Name: Temporal Distortion Projectile Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Slows this projectile's movement speed by 75% for 30 seconds.

Spell.Name: Temporal Distortion Creep Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Slows this creep's movement speed by 75% for 30 seconds.

Spell.Name: Temporal Distortion
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Slows the movement speed of all creeps and projectiles, as well as the attack speed of all towers, within 192px by 75%. Lasts for 30 seconds.

Spell.Name: Chronosphere
Spell.Text: Grants this tower the Chronosphere ability, which creates a rip in spacetime causing all creeps and projectiles within 128px to become trapped for its duration. \n\n&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 5 sec. duration, 1 charge

Spell.Name: Chronosphere Projectile Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Creates a rip in spacetime causing all projectiles within 128px to become trapped for 5 seconds.

Spell.Name: Chronosphere Creep Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Creates a rip in spacetime causing all creeps within a 128px to become trapped for 5 seconds.

Spell.Name: Chronosphere
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Creates a rip in spacetime causing all creeps and projectiles within 128px to become trapped for 5 seconds.

Spell.Name: Treble Cleft
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Treble Cleft ability, which deals either percent damage or fixed damage to nearby creeps, whichever is greater. Damage is dealt in waves that extend from this tower. Active ability.

&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - 1%/300 damage, 96px range
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - 2%/600 damage, 112px range
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 3%/900 damage, 128px range 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 4%/1200 damage, 144px range

Spell.Name: Treble Cleft
Spell.Text: Active ability. Deals 1% max. HP damage or 300 damage, whichever is greater, to creeps in a wave that extends 96px from this tower.

Spell.Name: Treble Cleft
Spell.Text: Active ability. Deals 2% max. HP damage or 600 damage, whichever is greater, to creeps in a wave that extends 112px from this tower.

Spell.Name: Treble Cleft
Spell.Text: Active ability. Deals 3% max. HP damage or 900 damage, whichever is greater, to creeps in a wave that extends 128px from this tower.

Spell.Name: Treble Cleft
Spell.Text: Active ability. Deals 4% max. HP damage or 1200 damage, whichever is greater, to creeps in a wave that extends 144px from this tower.

Spell.Name: Discord
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Discord ability, which deals global percent damage every time this tower fires. Damage dealt cannot pass a certain amount. Passive ability.
 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - 3% damage, 3000 maximum
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 4% damage, 6000 maximum
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 5% damage, 10000 maximum

Spell.Name: Discord
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Whenever this tower fires, all creeps on the page take damage equal to 3% of their maximum HP, up to a maximum of 3000 damage.

Spell.Name: Discord
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Whenever this tower fires, all creeps on the page take damage equal to 4% of their maximum HP, up to a maximum of 6000 damage.

Spell.Name: Discord
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Whenever this tower fires, all creeps on the page take damage equal to 5% of their maximum HP, up to a maximum of 10000 damage.

Spell.Name: Resonance
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Resonance ability, which reduces the armor of all creeps to zero, and doubles the damage that they take for a short amount of time. During that time, all creeps also move faster. Only affects creeps that are currently on the page. Lasts for 15 sec. Does not stack with Resonance. Triggered ability.
 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - +100% speed, 1 charge
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +50% speed, 2 charges

Spell.Name: Resonance Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Reduces the armor of all creeps to zero, and doubles the damage that they take for 15 seconds. During that time, all creeps also move 100% faster. Only affects creeps that are currently on the page.

Spell.Name: Resonance
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Reduces the armor of all creeps to zero, and doubles the damage that they take for 15 seconds. During that time, all creeps also move 100% faster. Only affects creeps that are currently on the page. 30 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Resonance Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Reduces the armor of all creeps to zero, and doubles the damage that they take for 15 seconds. During that time, all creeps also move 50% faster. Only affects creeps that are currently on the page.

Spell.Name: Resonance
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Reduces the armor of all creeps to zero, and doubles the damage that they take for 15 seconds. During that time, all creeps also move 50% faster. Only affects creeps that are currently on the page.

Spell.Name: Grand Carillon
Spell.Text: Grants this tower the Grand Carillon ability, which inflicts damage to all creeps on the page equal to a percentage of their maximum HP. If the creep's current HP is less than this percentage however, Grand Carillon deals no damage. 5 min. cooldown. Triggered ability.\n\n&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 35% max. HP damage

Spell.Name: Grand Carillon
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Inflicts damage to all creeps on the field equal to 35% of their maximum HP. If the creep has less than 35% of its maximum HP however, it takes no damage from this effect. 5 minute cooldown.

Spell.Name: Updraft
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Instantly deals 1 to 637 + normal damage to a single creep. 5 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Thunderbolt
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Thunderbolt ability, which deals normal damage plus a fixed amount to creeps in branching lines that extend from this tower. 5 sec. cooldown. Replaces Updraft. Triggered ability.

&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - +116 damage
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - +208 damage 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - +410 damage
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +867 damage

Spell.Name: Thunderbolt
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Instantly deals 116 + normal damage to creeps in branching lines that extend from this tower. 5 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Thunderbolt
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Instantly deals 208 + normal damage to creeps in branching lines that extend from this tower. 5 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Thunderbolt
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Instantly deals 410 + normal damage to creeps in branching lines that extend from this tower. 5 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Thunderbolt
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Instantly deals 867 + normal damage to creeps in branching lines that extend from this tower. 5 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Shower of Lightning
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Shower of Lightning ability, which deals normal damage plus a fixed amount every second for 4 seconds to all creeps within a certain distance from the targeted location. 10 sec. cooldown. Triggered ability.
 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - +910 damage/sec., 64px radius 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - +1263 damage/sec., 80px radius 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +1972 damage/sec., 96px radius

Spell.Name: Shower of Lightning
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Deals 910 + normal damage every second to all creeps within 64px of a targeted area. Lasts for 4 seconds. 10 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Shower of Lightning
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Deals 1263 + normal damage every second to all creeps within 80px of a targeted area. Lasts for 4 seconds. 10 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Shower of Lightning
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Deals 1972 + normal damage every second to all creeps within 96px of a targeted area. Lasts for 4 seconds. 10 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Turbulence
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Turbulence ability, which instantly deals normal damage plus a fixed amount to all creeps within a certain distance from the targeted location. 30 sec. cooldown. Triggered ability.

&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - +3531 damage, 192px radius
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +5964 damage, 256px radius

Spell.Name: Turbulence
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Instantly deals 3531 + normal damage to all creeps within 192px of a targeted area. 30 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Turbulence
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Instantly deals 5964 + normal damage to all creeps within 256px of a targeted area. 30 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Letum Ventus
Spell.Text: Grants this tower the Letum Ventus ability, which randomly casts Turbulence across the page. This spell has no effect on the actual Turbulence spell. 5 min. cooldown. Triggered ability.\n\n&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 25 casts, Lv5 Turbulence

Spell.Name: Letum Ventus
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Randomly casts Turbulence Lv5 across the page 25 times. This spell has no effect on the actual Turbulence Lv5 spell. 5 minute cooldown.

Spell.Name: Glacial Spike
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Glacial Spike ability, which allows this tower to fire slow-moving, piercing projectiles that cannot follow creeps. When these projectiles hit a creep, that creep gains armor and loses movement speed for 10 seconds. Creeps cannot be slowed more than 50% by any level of Glacial Spike, but there is no limit to the amount of armor gained. Replaces Updraft. Active ability.
 
&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - +1 armor/-1% move speed
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - +2 armor/-1% move speed
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - +3 armor/-1% move speed
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +4 armor/-1% move speed

Spell.Name: Glacial Spike Slow Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Slows creep movement speed by 1% for 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 50%.

Spell.Name: Glacial Spike Armor Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Increases creep armor by 1 for 10 seconds.

Spell.Name: Glacial Spike
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Fires slow-moving but piercing projectiles that cannot follow creeps. However, these projectiles increase creep armor by 1 and slow enemy creeps that they hit by 1%, up to a maximum of 50%, for 10 seconds.

Spell.Name: Glacial Spike
Spell.Text: Active ability. Fires slow-moving but piercing projectiles that cannot follow creeps. However, these projectiles increase creep armor by 1 and slow enemy creeps that they hit by 1%, up to a maximum of 50%, for 10 seconds.

Spell.Name: Glacial Spike Armor Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Increases creep armor by 2 for 10 seconds.

Spell.Name: Glacial Spike
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Fires slow-moving but piercing projectiles that cannot follow creeps. However, these projectiles increase creep armor by 2 and slow enemy creeps that they hit by 1%, up to a maximum of 50%, for 10 seconds.

Spell.Name: Glacial Spike
Spell.Text: Active ability. Fires slow-moving but piercing projectiles that cannot follow creeps. However, these projectiles increase creep armor by 2 and slow enemy creeps that they hit by 1%, up to a maximum of 50%, for 10 seconds.

Spell.Name: Glacial Spike Armor Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Increases creep armor by 3 for 10 seconds.

Spell.Name: Glacial Spike
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Fires slow-moving but piercing projectiles that cannot follow creeps. However, these projectiles increase creep armor by 3 and slow enemy creeps that they hit by 1%, up to a maximum of 50%, for 10 seconds.

Spell.Name: Glacial Spike
Spell.Text: Active ability. Fires slow-moving but piercing projectiles that cannot follow creeps. However, these projectiles increase creep armor by 3 and slow enemy creeps that they hit by 1%, up to a maximum of 50%, for 10 seconds.

Spell.Name: Glacial Spike Armor Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Increases creep armor by 4 for 10 seconds.

Spell.Name: Glacial Spike
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Fires slow-moving but piercing projectiles that cannot follow creeps. However, these projectiles increase creep armor by 4 and slow enemy creeps that they hit by 1%, up to a maximum of 50%, for 10 seconds.

Spell.Name: Glacial Spike
Spell.Text: Active ability. Fires slow-moving but piercing projectiles that cannot follow creeps. However, these projectiles increase creep armor by 4 and slow enemy creeps that they hit by 1%, up to a maximum of 50%, for 10 seconds.

Spell.Name: Blizzard
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Blizzard ability, which creates a snowstorm on the page that damages and slows down creeps caught in its path. The storm starts out weak, but becomes more damaging over time. Heavily armored creeps are slowed more than lightly armored ones, but the slowing effect cannot exceed 75% regardless of armor. Lasts for 10 seconds. 1 min. cooldown. Triggered ability.

&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - +163 damage/sec. for 5 sec., -1% move speed per 4 armor 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - +221 damage/sec. for 6 sec., -1% move speed per 3 armor
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +315 damage/sec. for 8 sec., -1% move speed per 2 armor

Spell.Name: Blizzard Slow Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Slows the targeted creep by 1% for every 4 points of armor that it has, up to a maximum of 75%.
Spell.Script: MOD SELF CREEP_SPEED_BONUS (-1 * (MAX_FIT (ABS_VAL ((GET ARMOR SELF) / 4)) 75)) PERCENT;

Spell.Name: Blizzard
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Calls forth a snowstorm that damages and slows down creeps in its wake. The snowstorm is initially weak, but gains 163 damage per second for the first 5 seconds of this spell. Creeps in the storm are also slowed by 1% for every 4 points of armor that they have, up to a maximum of 75%. Lasts for 10 seconds. 1 minute cooldown.

Spell.Name: Blizzard Slow Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Slows the targeted creep by 1% for every 3 points of armor that it has, up to a maximum of 75%.
Spell.Script: MOD SELF CREEP_SPEED_BONUS (-1 * (MAX_FIT (ABS_VAL ((GET ARMOR SELF) / 3)) 75)) PERCENT;

Spell.Name: Blizzard
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Calls forth a snowstorm that damages and slows down creeps in its wake. The snowstorm is initially weak, but gains 221 damage per second for the first 6 seconds of this spell. Creeps in the storm are also slowed by 1% for every 3 points of armor that they have, up to a maximum of 75%. Lasts for 10 seconds. 1 minute cooldown.

Spell.Name: Blizzard Slow Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Slows the targeted creep by 1% for every 2 points of armor that it has, up to a maximum of 75%.
Spell.Script: MOD SELF CREEP_SPEED_BONUS (-1 * (MAX_FIT (ABS_VAL ((GET ARMOR SELF) / 2)) 75)) PERCENT;

Spell.Name: Blizzard
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Calls forth a snowstorm that damages and slows down creeps in its wake. The snowstorm is initially weak, but gains 315 damage per second for the first 8 seconds of this spell. Creeps in the storm are also slowed by 1% for every 2 points of armor that they have, up to a maximum of 75%. Lasts for 10 seconds. 1 minute cooldown.

Spell.Name: Frostbite
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Frostbite ability, which deals normal damage plus an additional amount to nearby creeps every second. Heavily armored creeps are damaged much more than lightly armored ones. Passive ability.

&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 5x multiplier, 64px radius
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 10x multiplier, 96px radius

Spell.Name: Frostbite
Spell.Text: Passive ability. All creeps within 64px from this tower take damage equal to their armor value + normal damage x5 every second.

Spell.Name: Frostbite
Spell.Text: Passive ability. All creeps within 96px from this tower take damage equal to their armor value + normal damage x10 every second.
Spell.Script: REMOVE_GOBJECT 37 SELF; ADD_GOBJECT 38 (POINT2D ((GET POS_X SELF) + 16) ((GET POS_Y SELF) + 16));

Spell.Name: Fimbulwinter
Spell.Text: Grants this tower the Fimbulwinter ability, which freezes all creeps that are currently on the page for 30 seconds. Creeps frozen by Fimbulwinter gain a large amount of armor for the duration.\n\n&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +100 armor, 1 charge

Spell.Name: Fimbulwinter Freeze Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. This creep is frozen for 30 seconds, preventing its movement. In addition, it gains 100 armor for the duration.
Spell.Script: SET SELF CREEP_CAN_MOVE FALSE FLAT; MOD SELF CREEP_ARMOR_FLAT 100 FLAT;

Spell.Name: Fimbulwinter
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Freezes all creeps on the page for 30 seconds, preventing their movement. In addition, creeps that are frozen by this effect gain 100 armor for the duration.

Spell.Name: Fade
Spell.Text: Passive ability. This tower will not obstruct creep movement.

Spell.Name: No Man's Land
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the No Man's Land ability, which allows creeps to move through it. In addition, creeps that walk over this tower will take normal damage plus an additional amount every second that they remain. Replaces Fade. Passive ability.

&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - +116 damage/sec. 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - +269 damage/sec.
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - +695 damage/sec.
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +1928 damage/sec.

Spell.Name: No Man's Land
Spell.Text: Passive ability. This tower will not obstruct creep movement. In addition, creeps that walk over this tower will take 116 + normal damage every second, as long as they remain.
Spell.Script: SET SELF TOWER_GHOST_STATE TRUE FLAT; ADD_GOBJECT 39 (POINT2D ((GET POS_X SELF) + 1) ((GET POS_Y SELF) + 1));

Spell.Name: No Man's Land
Spell.Text: Passive ability. This tower will not obstruct creep movement. In addition, creeps that walk over this tower will take 269 + normal damage every second, as long as they remain.

Spell.Name: No Man's Land
Spell.Text: Passive ability. This tower will not obstruct creep movement. In addition, creeps that walk over this tower will take 695 + normal damage every second, as long as they remain.

Spell.Name: No Man's Land
Spell.Text: Passive ability. This tower will not obstruct creep movement. In addition, creeps that walk over this tower will take 1928 + normal damage every second, as long as they remain.

Spell.Name: Ransom Lord
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Ransom Lord ability, which greatly increases the bounty of any creep that is currently on the tower. When the creep leaves the tower, its bounty returns to normal. Passive ability.

&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - +100% bounty
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - +200% bounty 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +300% bounty

Spell.Name: Ransom Lord Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Increases this creep's bounty by 100%.

Spell.Name: Ransom Lord
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Creeps on this tower grant 100% more ink when killed. This effect disappears when the creep is no longer on the tower.

Spell.Name: Ransom Lord Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Increases this creep's bounty by 200%.

Spell.Name: Ransom Lord
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Creeps on this tower grant 200% more ink when killed. This effect disappears when the creep is no longer on the tower.
Spell.Script: REMOVE_GOBJECT 43 SELF; ADD_GOBJECT 44 (POINT2D ((GET POS_X SELF) + 1) ((GET POS_Y SELF) + 1));

Spell.Name: Ransom Lord Effect
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Increases this creep's bounty by 300%.

Spell.Name: Ransom Lord
Spell.Text: Passive ability. Creeps on this tower grant 300% more ink when killed. This effect disappears when the creep is no longer on the tower.
Spell.Script: REMOVE_GOBJECT 44 SELF; ADD_GOBJECT 45 (POINT2D ((GET POS_X SELF) + 1) ((GET POS_Y SELF) + 1));

Spell.Name: Give and Take
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Give and Take ability, which selects a creep on the page. That creep gains maximum HP and current HP equal to the combined maximum HP of every other creep on the page. The maximum HP and current HP of every other creep on the page is reduced. Triggered ability.

&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 50% reduced HP, 1 charge
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 75% reduced HP, 1 charge

Spell.Name: Give and Take
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Increases the maximum and current HP of the targeted creep by an amount equal to the combined maximum HP of every creep on the page. Also, the maximum HP of every other creep on the page is permanently reduced by 50%.

Spell.Name: Give and Take
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Increases the maximum and current HP of the targeted creep by an amount equal to the combined maximum HP of every creep on the page. Also, the maximum HP of every other creep on the page is permanently reduced by 75%.

Spell.Name: Summary Execution
Spell.Text: Grants this tower the Summary Execution ability, which allows this tower to instantly kill the creep with the highest current HP on the page. Afterwards, all remaining creeps on the page take additional damage, but move faster as well.\n \n&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +100% damage, +150% move speed, 1 charge

Spell.Name: Summary Execution
Spell.Text: Triggered ability. Instantly kills the creep with the highest current HP on the page, which sends all other creeps into a panic. These creeps take 100% more damage from all sources, but move 150% faster.
